name: SPACE PROTECTOR-2D GAME
description:
This is a simple 2d space-shooter game, with a classic 80's arcade style. It is a free-to-play game but it contains additional in-game power-ups that can be obtained by watching a simple promotional video. In the settings screen you can mute the sound effects and also turn them down and up their volume.

Every now and then a boss appears, very difficult to defeat, let's see how much score you will score ;)
